issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Acquire locks before generating valid transaction list for some operations

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1) Only locks for tables should be checked.
2) Check on whether {{txnWriteIdList}} is null or not needs to be fixed: it should be done on the configuration property value, as the object {{txnWriteIdList}} will never be null.

comments.body: [~ekoifman], new patch uploaded addressing the issue with locks over non-table entities. Please, let me know if it looks fine or if you prefer that I split the patch. Thanks

Patch fixes also the NPE for the txn list.

While checking this issue, I discovered HIVE-19893 that needs to be fixed too.

+1 patch 6.

Incidentally, acid (i.e. DbTxnManager always uses DbLockManager) ignores

hive.lock.manager setting so

isValidTxnListState() does not need any logic for other LMs. This is just FYI, for future.
